author: metachris_
content:
It'd be great if all **CL clients would send their client name and specific version as user-agent to the builder-API requests**! 

Yesterday we were able to identify the faulty Prysm version through the user-agent, and could disable bids for just this particular CL+version on the relays, to avoid proposers missing slots unnecessarily. Having the CL client with version in the UA is immensely helpful for these types of investigations and possible particular support and solutions ✡️e
